name: Twenty Fourteen Reloaded
tagline: Twenty Fourteen Reloaded is derived from the WordPress 2014 official theme. See website for demo.
body: twentyfourteen-reloaded ======================= Twenty Fourteen Reloaded is derived from the WordPress 2014 official theme. See [website] (http://mikuru.tw/ "kmd's Weblog") for demo. Feature: -------- 1. Transparency for entry headers, which make presentation smoother. 2. Support both native color scheme and [Fourteen Colors Plugin] (http://wordpress.org/plugins/fourteen-colors/ "Fourteen Colors"). 3. Visible areas are fine-tuned for best readability. 4. Trivial elements are hidden when using small screen.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
